
// AUTO-GENERATED by camel-package-maven-plugin - DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
= camel get properties

List configuration properties


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel get properties [options]
----



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--internal` | Whether to include internal configuration |  | boolean
| `--mask` | Whether to mask configuration values to avoid printing sensitive information such as password or access keys | true | boolean
| `--sort` | Sort by pid, name or key | pid | String
| `--startup` | List only startup configuration |  | boolean
| `--verbose` | Whether to include more details |  | boolean
| `--watch` | Execute periodically and showing output fullscreen |  | boolean
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
